unnormalised: Boro, mhunnllear tumchea jivitaantlo talakacho kall chol’la, hã? Mhaka patieum, ek Adv. mhunn hanvem sogllem dekhlam, tum eksurem nhoi. Kutumbacho Kaido ek dongra-raan zoxem dista, khas korun hanga Bharotaant, punn thoddeo mukhel vostu somzolean tumchi vat vhoiraunk khub modot zatli. Hanv hem sodanch vichartat tea kaim sadaronn proxnnancher uloium-ia.
normalised: Bore, tumchea jivitantlo divorce chol’la, hã? Mhozo visvās dovra, ek advocate mhunn hanvem sogllem dekhlam, tum ekloch nãi. Kutumb Niyom kānon ek zongal bhaxen dista, khas korun Bhāratant, punn thoddeo mukhel vostu somzullyar tumi tachem margdarshan korunk khorench modot zateli. Hanv hem sodanch vichārtai tim kaim sādhāron prosn sodunk vochum-ia.

unnormalised: Poilech fautt, tumche hokk kitem? Hem khub mhotvachem! Tum baile assa vo dadlo, kaido tumkam rakhonn korpak assa. Thoddeo vostu zoxe ki nirvahakharchem (alimony, jem kaim zonn mhontat), bhurgeanchi rakhnni, ani giresteche vantte hem khub mhotvachem. Vostu tankam tankanch barobor zaatele mhunn koslich dharanna dhortat naka; thik nitichem sal’la gheiat. Hanvem oxe kees dekhleaat zantun lokhanchi rupiaank lok zatta karonn tankam tankanchea labhanchem khobre naaslem.
normalised: Poilem vostu poili, tumchea odhikār kitea? Hem bhov vhodd! Tum ek bailechea vo dadlea asa, niyom tumchem rokkhonn korunk asa. Dhakllopon (alimony, kaim lok taka mhunta) bhurgeanchem posonn, ani sompt’tichem vibhāgon bhov mahatvachem asa. Fokot vichar korunk naktaka vostu kam korpache asat; purnn niyom vichar ghea. Hanvem dekhlam lokh rupiak lokk vachotat kiteak tem tanchi milkatanchi nallakuch nasle.

unnormalised: Giresteche vixim uloitaastanam, *konnak kitem melta?* Atam, hanga vostu kothinn zata, khas korun tum ani tumchea ghorkarnnak khub girestkai assa zalear. Tem eksarkhem assa? Tem lagnam adim vo uprant ghetlem? Tum-i tem gheunk vo samballunk modot keli? He soglle proxn adalot vichartali. Kaim keesant, lagnachea vellar mellilleo bhetti sud’dha lagnachi girestkai mhunn mantat.
normalised: Sompt’tichi ulop, konnachea kiten mellta? Ata, hem bhov vankdda vankdda zata, khas korun tum ani tumchem potin bhov-i vostu asta. Tem milun ghēla? Tum lagin poilem tem viktem ghelem vo pachāt? Tum tachem vikat gheun vo sambhallun kaim modot keli? He prosn kortuch vicharta. Kaim kezin, laginache vellanche vostu mellyo astam tem laginacho sompt’tin vichar korunk zata.

unnormalised: Bhurgeanchi rakhnni anik ek vhodd proxn. Adaloti sadaronnponni bhurgeanchea boreponnak poilem sthan ditat. Mukhel rakhnnekaar konn? Konn tankam tankanchea vikasak boreantolem borem vatavronn diunk xakta? Tem sodanch nhoi ki *tumkam* kitem zai punn tumchea bhurgeank kitem borem tem. Mhaka patieum, tumchea bhurgeank khellnneam zoxem vaprunk sodop adaloteant (ani jivitun!) vinashachi reseep.
normalised: Burgeanchem posonn ek dusrem vhodd vichārachem vostu asa. Kortuch chodd korun burgeanchea bhallakaichi dekhnne diatat. Konn poilo sambhall korta? Konn tanchi vaddicho boreantolo bore vatavaron dinchacho? Tem sodanch tumchi koxi aschi asa punn tumchea bhurgeakacho boreantlo bore. Mhozo visvās dovra, tumchea bhurgeakacho tumi khella toyak bhaxen vaprunk veglle dis zatelim kortan (ani jivitan!).

unnormalised: Uprant nirvahakharchem assa. Hem mul’lponni ek ghorkarnn dusrea ghorkarnnak talakan uprant diupi arthik aadhar. Tem ek pavttuch ditole zalear dit vo dor mhoineaak diunche zalear diunche. Ghorkarnnanche mellovpachi podvi, lagnachea vellar jievopachi sthapit rit, ani lagnachem kitllem kall aslem hem vicharant gheta. Hanvem oxe kees dekhleaat zantun bailek, je 20+ vorsam gharaantlem kam korunk asli tika khub motte rupia melle.
normalised: Magir dakhllopon asa. Hem sarkeche sampattivik aadhar ek potin dusreak dita divorce zaunchea magir. Tem ek rupenche sampattivik divop vo mhoineasunchea sampattivik divop zavunk xakta. Vicharant ghevopachim vastu don-ui potinanchi kamāchi sampativik, tanchi jivānkhi laginache vellāk, ani laginachi lambai. Hanvem kezin dekhlam bailli ji homemeikar aslem vis pākki varṣank, tanne ek vhodd rupiya ghetele.

unnormalised: Atam, nitivaadichea vangdda vevhaar korpacher uloium-ia. Thik Adv. vinchun kaddop khub mhotvachem. Fukotacheak vochat naka! Kutumbachea Kaideant onnbhov asli tea mon’xaak sodat, tumkam uloitaastanam sovlokat zannovta tea mon’xaak, ani tumchea khas zaruanchi somoz dita tea mon’xaak. Sokoilem sangchem ani online xikchem. Ek boro nitivaadi mellovop ek boro doctor mellovlea zoxem-tem paisachea laikichem.
normalised: Ata, lawyerank lagun vapar korchi ulop korum-ia. Borem advocate vinnchench bhov mahatvachem. Fokot sonthkorechea lokache magir vachonk naktaka! Kutumb Niyom kānont zaitha anubhaviche dhuva ani konn tumkam ulovpak bore dista ani konn tumchea soddunche garjeka somzauta tanchi dhond. Dusrea lokank vicharun suchan dhoa ani internentacher puravacho vach. Ek boro loyer ghea ek boro doctor mellun bhaxen - tem ek vhodd investimenth.

unnormalised: Anik ek vhodd vostu mhunnllear kagotam. Soglle sambhallun dovorat! Lagnachem kagot, girestkaiche kagot, bankache satty, voizki likhnn... sogllem. Tumchea kodden kitli purovo astoli titli tumchi vaat zorachi zatoli. Hanvem tumchea kees jikhleat kiteak tankam nihalkacheo rekordo sambhallun dovorleo. Nihalponni, aiz ek file suru korat.
normalised: Ek dusre vhodd vostu dasta-veje. Sogllem dhoa! Laginacho pramanya potra, sompt’tichea potra, benk stetment, medikol rekords... sogllem. Bhov puravo tumcho asta, tumchem kes bhov takatvont asteli. Hanvem clientak kes jetelim fokot kiteak tem purnn rekhords dhotat. Gambhirponan ghevn, ata poyr ek file start kara.

unnormalised: Ani tumchea apravak prapavn korat. Talak, dolleachea mogacho aslo zalear sud’dha, vell gheta. Bharoti nitichem pormonn tanchea ghainerchich vell kaddpak vollokh dita. Dhiracheo vellank, kagotanchim kamam ani bhavnechim vodd-voddeank toyar ravat. Nirax zatat naka! Zor ravat ani lamb khellacher lakkh dovorat.
normalised: Ani tumchea axanchim toyāri kara. Divorce, manvotāye astana, vell gheta. Bharati Niyom kānon tīr velakchi nallach nãi. Vell lagpacho toyar zaunchea, kagdpatra, ani bhavnanchim uddav uddea. Nirutsāh zaunk naktaka! Tākat dhara ani lamb khēllacher dhon dhara.

unnormalised: Madhyostik vo dhairyak vichar korat. Purnn nitichea zhogddeant zhomp gheunchea adim, dusrea zhogdde vhoddoupachinch riti polloiat. Madhyostik tumchea ghorkarnnak ani tumkam adaloteant vochonaastana samadhana pavonk modot koronk xakta. Hem tumcho vell, poiso, ani bhov kuxik dukhi samballonk xakta. Mhaka patieum, thodde pavtti bosun uloilean tumi ek vhodd somaz diunk xakta.
normalised: Vichaar kara madhyasthachi vo sollyachi. Poilim kessa marneak, dusrea dubaichim margachi shodh kara. Madhyastha tumi ani tumchem potin ek samadhan melunk modot korunk xakta kortak vochonk nastan. Hantum vell bachaita, rupiya, ani bhov stres. Mhozo visvās dovra, konnkhuy basunk ani ulopchea magir ek sonsārakacho khōll korunk xakta.

unnormalised: Nimannem, tumchi kaallji ghennk mhonn ugddas dovorat. Talak khub dukhi diupi asta. Tumchea monache ani xorirache bhaleak poilem sthan diat. Borem jeun, kallzat dovorn, ani bori nhid ghetat. Tumchea ixttank ani kutumbak aadhar zai. Zai zalear daktoraanche kodden vochonk bhiyat naka. Tum hantunlean bhair sortole! Ani ugddas dovorat, hem Adv. tumchea pasun axeta.
normalised: Nidheak, tumcho samball korunk zhoorat dhoa. Divorce bhov stres-vōnt zata. Tumchem mon ani shareeriche bhallkaichi mahatvo dhoa. Borem khaunk, eksariz kara, ani bhov nit zop kara. Tumchea ixtankani ani kutumbankanchim aadhar mellonk sod. Dar korunk naktaka tor piṣārachek sodunk tumkam zhoorat dako. Tumim heacho puravo melunk zatelim! Ani dhoa tumcho advocate tumchea roddin khaxa asun asa.
